pageTitle: Craft Active Bike Socks - Bike Socks | Competitive Cyclist
title: Socks
textBeforeTable: Craft Size chart cycling Recommended Use: polyamide Material: Tech Specs The Craft Active Bike Socks are available in sizes X-Small through X-Large and in the color Black. The socks have been channel-stitched throughout, with ultra-thin uppers, to allow warm air to circulate and cool down. The polyamide material was applied to the socks using Craft's 'bodymapping' technology as a means to target specific pressure points on the foot with varying thicknesses of fabric. Across the arch of the foot, a lightweight mesh was applied to increase ventilation. Additionally, arched ribs line the sides of the socks, making sure they don't shift while inside of your cycling shoes. Craft finished off its Active Bike Socks with wide Lycra cuffs and extra padding at the heel and toes for added comfort. Craft's Active Bike Socks fall under its 'sport-specific' category, meaning that they were designed to correspond to the needs of a cyclist's feet while in motion.
